channel.title: Spellbook
channel.description:
How can i make that when i click on chaos altar it would change my modern magic spellbook to lunar?
tyyyyyyyyyyyyyyyy
:) :) :) :) :)

item.title: Spellbook
item.dc:creator: @Blazcobain Blazcobain
item.description:
@Blazcobain wrote:

[quote=“Cole1497, post:4, topic:409965”][quote author=Blazcobain link=topic=511238.msg3709899#msg3709899 date=1313280907]

If you are using PI, this goes into src/model/players/actionhandler.java

case CHAOS_ALTAR_ID: if (c.playerMagicBook == 0) { c.playerMagicBook = 1; c.setSidebarInterface(6, 29999); //lunar /.cLass c.sendMessage("An lunar wisdomin fills your mind."); c.getPA().resetAutocast(); } else { c.setSidebarInterface(6, 1151); //modern /.cLass c.playerMagicBook = 0; c.sendMessage("You feel a drain on your memory."); c.autocastId = -1; c.getPA().resetAutocast(); } break;

thanks but what is PI?
[/quote]
Terrible
A base for servers.[/quote]

Its not working. I made everything right including case 411 …
Maybe i put the code on other place? becouse i just randomly placed it somewhere…
And by the way. you look so helpful. Can you help me with this?
when im killed by other player skulled or not or killed by monster i dont lose item i keep every single item on death :SSSSSSSS

Read full topic

If you are using PI, this goes into src/model/players/actionhandler.java

case CHAOS_ALTAR_ID: if (c.playerMagicBook == 0) { c.playerMagicBook = 1; c.setSidebarInterface(6, 29999); //lunar /.cLass c.sendMessage("An lunar wisdomin fills your mind."); c.getPA().resetAutocast(); } else { c.setSidebarInterface(6, 1151); //modern /.cLass c.playerMagicBook = 0; c.sendMessage("You feel a drain on your memory."); c.autocastId = -1; c.getPA().resetAutocast(); } break;
[/quote]

thanks but what is PI?[/quote]
Terrible
A base for servers.
